title: What was the FIRST skin that you bought? Do you still use it and cherish it?
body:
Nostalgic Discussions are always my favorite. So here is one.....


My first skin was Muse Sona{{champion:37}} (975 RP) . I bought this skin on my friends Paypal account way back in late season 2 on my EUW account (me and my friends did EUW since we thought they were the best at the time). To this day, I use it on occasion, but have to admit I could use it more.  I think it is one of the relaxing skins in this game and easily her most elegant one. It reminds me of the climb to 30, which was easily the funnest part of the game that I experienced. 

How about you guys?

replies.body: The Digital Collectors Pack to get Goth Annie. :3 She's still pretty cool, but I don't play Annie much anymore.

The first role I learned was ADC so technically it was Heartseeker {{champion:22}} but I quickly found I hated ADC and moved to support where I got Sweetheart {{champion:37}}, which I absolutely love and I honestly only stopped using because I got DJ. And I only use DJ most of the time now because everyone likes to hear it and I don't mind giving other players that experience (since NOW I own all of her skins, with the re-release of Muse this Snowdown! Funny, it was your first and my last!). 

But I should use Sweetheart more, it's so pretty. Lately I've been using Silent Night though because Christmas so I'll probably use Sweetheart more around Valentines day.
Arcade Sona. I don't use it anymore though. If I'm playing Sona I use Pentakill Sona now. Much better thematically.
I've bought so many that I've lost track.

Pentakill Yorick.

As an aside, did you know that it's been 2004 days (as of December 15, 2016) since Yorick's had a new skin, and there seem to be no plans from Riot in the near future to rectify this?

Faker will have three skins before Yorick does, hehe.
ah rugged garen i used it so much it might as well come up as the default for me
Mercenary Kat, I have 4 skins on her, it's still my default one XD
Pickpocket Twitch, I told myself I wasn't gonna spend money on League until I saw this skin and was like "I NEED IT"
Assassin Master Yi back in S2...oh boy I was obsessed with Yi back then
First one I bought was Pop Star Ahri. I used it often till Arcade Ahri came out.
first skin was from hextech, it was sanguine garen

Battle Bunny Riven.
I actually dont even play Riven. I only played her when I first started (2-3 yrs ago) playing league and only tried getting into her from being inspired by watching Youtube videos of BoxBox lol. I remember when I would go to botlane with Riven and I didnt even knew what I was even doing at the time despite my teammates raging at me like hell. Memories.
Red Card Katarina way back in 2010 for the World Cup. Still one of my favorites!

I think the first skin i ever got..... Was groovy Zilean. A friend gifted it to me cause i apperently was a -cough cough- bomb zilean B-) still use that skin though, and it looks pretty sweet with my mastery 7 with him

For me it was Prototype Viktor. Hell, Viktor actually made me buy RP for him+skin the first time way back when he got released - also the first and only time I ever spent RP on a champion.

I know people say it's the most lacking skin option for him. But I loved it back then and I love it now. It goes well with red Hex Core glow and W particles round it up nicely. Overall nothing spectacular but I just like the feel; the overal look of it combined with his voice.

I don't remember which skin I bought first, but I remember that Ryze was my first champion. Ahh, season 1 Ryze. I was so trash at you, but I played you anyways even when I went 0/15 in bot games. I was trash at the game as a whole. Now, with the current Ryze, I typically don't feed as badly and I know what to do, I just don't play him often enough and need more practice.

My first skin I think was either Surprise Party Fiddlesticks or Super Teemo. I don't use either of them because I don't play either champion anywhere near to as often. I do remember my first pentakill though. Teemo in bots.
My first Was secret Agent Missfortune way back in season 3. i rotate between all of mf's skins.
